description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync X461S - 46" LED Backlit Super-Slim Full HD LCD Display
Operating digital signage has never been easier than with the 46" NEC X461S. This super-slim Full HD LCD display offers LED backlighting technology to deliver high-quality imagery at a lower power consumption than its peers. The industry's first standardized input, the Open Pluggable Specification (OPS) slot, increases flexibility for users in any digital signage application, including video walls where the X461S can be implemented into configurations up to 10 x 10.
dimensions weight details: Panel with stand - 106 cm x 33 cm x 66.5 cm x 21 kg ¦ Panel without stand - 106 cm x 4.3 cm x 61.8 cm x 20 kg
dimensions wxdxh: 106 cm x 4.3 cm x 61.8 cm - without stand
features: On/off timer, clock, on-screen menu, ambient light sensor (ALS), screen saver, AmbiBright, picture on picture (no tuner), TileMatrix (10 x 10), temperature sensor, Rapid Response technology, portrait mode, TileComp, landscape mode, CableComp+, Aspect ratio control (ARC)
